# Who I am?

My name is Liwei Jiang. You can call me Tony if you like.

Currently, I am a second-year master of public policy student at Sanford School of Public Policy, Duke University. My concentration is energy and environment policy. Before came to Duke, I had my undergraduate at Southern University of Science and technology in China, majoring in Chemistry. Then, I worked in multiple industries for three years in China, including e-commerce, exports, and education.

2021-2023 Master of Public Policy, Energy and Environment Policy Concentration, Duke University, Durham, NC, USA
